analysis.description:
Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#285-294) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(bounty,bountyCount) (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#291-294)

Crowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#325-329) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#327-328)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#330-350) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#342-343)

Crowdsale.bountyCount should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#255-257)
Crowdsale.hardcapStage1 should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#265-266)
Crowdsale.hardcapStage2 should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#268-269)
Crowdsale.hardcapStage3 should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#270-272)
Crowdsale.rateStage1 should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#272)
Crowdsale.rateStage2 should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#272-273)
Crowdsale.rateStage3 should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol#273)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0x6e5c02cf6fa4770a8c91d19cf58d24bd24bcc6b8.sol:
